lender.name: Niya

lender.name: Arely
lender.occupational_info:
Los esfuerzos del RAM están dirigidos a lograr mejoras duraderas en la calidad de vida de los niños de escasos recursos del Cusco y del Perú, mediante un proceso que une el trabajo de personas de otras culturas y que le da significación en su vida, al:  Permitir que los niños de escasos recursos del Cusco y sus familias satisfagan sus necesidades de alimentación / nutrición, educación, salud y aumentar sus capacidades para participar en su sociedad y beneficiarse de la misma.  Promover el respeto de los derechos de los niños.  Promover la comprensión, apoyo y unidad entre personas de diferentes países y culturas.
ESTRATEGIAS :
Se fundamentan en el crecimiento adecuado del niño, desarrollando las destrezas de los niños y sus familias, y que generan confianza en su propia capacidad, en su autodesarrollo, de tal manera que sean capaces de acceder a oportunidades que les permitan afrontar las dificultades y pobreza que se les presenta.
PROGRAMAS :
 Alimentación / nutrición.  Salud.  Educación.  Asistencia social.  Proyección social.
PRINCIPIOS PROGRAMATICOS:
 De aprendizaje.  De asistencia.  De integración.  De equidad de género.  De empoderamiento.  De Cooperación.  De conservación y utilización adecuada de los recursos naturales.  De comunicación intercultural.  De respeto de los valores tradicionales.  De amistad. En este sentido, en torno a lo que referimos la proyección social, se ha considerado importante insertar y enseñar tanto a los niños como a sus fam,ilias en el aprendizaje y la implmentación de herramientas de trabajo que les permita tener estrategias de subsistencia, entre ellas esta la elaboración de diferentes productos tanto alimenticios chocolates, panaderia , como productos de uso: sandalias, chompas, Artesania, bisuteria , los que les permitan generarse a ellos mismos los niños y a sus familias otro ingreso que satisfaga todas las necesidades básicas que ellos por si mismos y por su condición dificil no pueden satisfacer. así mismo permitira generar un ingreso más al Centro, lo que contribuiria enormemente a poder atender a mayor cantidad de niños de bajos recursos. el compromiso del Centro con la institución patrocinadora se da en los niveles: - El Cariño, la lealtad y el agradecimiento de los niños y del Centro RAM. -Todo producto elaborado por los niños y el Centro tendra una etiqueta donde se agradecra y publicitara la labor social del patrocinador respecto al centro y los niños.
Un mundo en el que los niños desarrollan su pleno potencial en nuestra sociedad, que respete sus derechos y su dignidad de personas

I worked for 18 hours/the day. 18 hours were estimated from my 2 place companies work. in PT indosat I worked for 12 hours/day in CV.smile I worked for 6 hours/days. and the total time for me berker was 18 hours from the whole.

lender.name: Blauqkween
lender.loan_because: Can. I do not have much but I have more than many in this world and if I can in any way make someones life better I will.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the opportunity travel to Rwanda while studying microfinance and have seen firsthand that microfinance works and the opportunities it provides entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Bethany & Vincent
lender.loan_because: I want to help support my fellow human beings in living their dreams. As a small business owner, I know how important it can be to just get that little bit extra to make that dream a reality.
lender.occupational_info: Three years ago my husband and I started a small artisan confections business with everything made by hand. We started with nothing. I was attending university at the same time and a close friend told me about Kiva. I was so excited that that there was a site devoted to helping people love their dreams! When we were first starting out we found Accion USA through Kiva and they helped us get over the financial hump and grow our business. I truly believe in sites like Kiva and micro loans in general. They really do make a difference.

lender.name: SASsy
lender.occupational_info: SASsy stands for "Social Action Social." We're a group of socially concious people based in Vancouver, Canada who meet once a month to discuss social and environmental issues and brainstorm actions to create positive change. Micro-finance was our discussion topic for March 2009 and joining KIVA is our positive action. Thanks for this opportunity and best of luck to all the entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I respect the Kiva model of micro loans to help finance entrepreneurs in less developed countries. It works, and while each loan is small, taken together they add up to significant change for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and a school principal.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: It seems amazing that the amount of money I, a disabled graduate student and crafter, can afford to lend, can still help someone far away from me succeed in her dreams and work.
lender.occupational_info: I observe the way individual people relate to each other in the different parts of society that I belong to, and I find the similarities in what seem to be very dissimilar groups. When I teach, I try to help my students learn that we are all human, and that we all have similar needs and goals, which may just look different on the surface.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I help grocery stores serve their customers better.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I have spent a lot of my life living in Africa, Asia and now the Pacific and I meet so many people with brilliant ideas who need just a bit of help to take off
lender.occupational_info: Helping radio stations get better at giving their listeners good information

lender.name: Heinrich
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a very good way to fight and reduce poverty, to enable people to build their live in self-dermination, to fight and reduce violence and injustice which is often caused by unemployment and social inequality. It is also an amazing expirience to join a congregation and community which works on the same subject, has similar goals and has a nonprofit and unselfish character. Born in Germany with all the privileges as education, safety, stability, employment, insurance, and medical care which we took always for granted, I feel the obligation to support others which weren't that lucky, often by birth and fate, without personal failures and deeds.
lender.occupational_info: My work is currently as a so called development worker for a German organization. I am working as an advisor at a Palestinian vocational school in Jerusalem. My profession is electrical engineering, but I am working since the late eighties mainly in development, aid and emergency projects in Africa and in the Middle East.

lender.name: Mak
lender.loan_because: what might be little to us can make a great impact in someone else's life.

lender.name: Janne
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help balance the huge financial inequality in the world. Of course, it doesn't change the systemic problems...
lender.occupational_info:
I spend most of my working hours sitting in an office in front of a computer, following the performance of the larger computer systems I'm responsible for, giving e-mail advice to the users, planning improvements to the systems, meeting with my colleagues in order to talk about the plans and making sure our ideas about the possible improvements agree. I also follow Internet discussion on similar operations, in order to gain new insight to and information on how to make it all work better, to make it easier and more comfortable for the users of the system to use it. Some workdays are more intense, if there appears something that interrupts the smooth operation of the systems, or when we're doing upgrades or other improvements.
However, currently (in 2010) I'm on a leave from my work, working on my master's thesis. It's a common flaw in an IT professional to keep his studies on hold for years and years, but I really think that I've been hanging around the university for long enough.

lender.name: Trevor/Ardachy
lender.loan_because: I can and it seems a great way of helping those who want to help themselves, their families and their communities.

lender.occupational_info: I work with the creation and planning of new projects. I also track progress on active projects to make sure the project is completed on time, and delivers the results that we need from it.

lender.name: Armando
lender.loan_because: Solicito un prestamo para poder poder crecer en mi negocio de eventos infantiles, adquirir nuevo material inflable con el fin de poder tener un activo para el nacimiento de mi próximo hijo en Junio. Amo esta posibilidad y se que el universo me premitira la perfecta realizacion de mi sueño para mi bien y el de todos los involucrados.
lender.occupational_info: De Lunes a Viernes trabajo como empleado administratico en un Colegio de la Comuna de Chiguayante, los fines de semana arriendo inflables y camas elasticas para cumpleaños, ademas estoy entrando en el comercio electronico, luego de conocer la ley de atracción, se que el universo nos permitirá lograr nuestros sueños.

Dan works on airplanes to make sure everything is in good flying condition.

lender.name: immixGroup
lender.loan_because: In fulfillment of its social responsibility as a company, immixGroup actively supports numerous charitable causes at both the local and national levels through the immixGroup Foundation. The immixGroup Foundation is a non-profit 501(c)(3) organization.

lender.name: lauren
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with a wonderful family and great job. I loan because I want to share my blessings with others and to empower other women to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art to elementary children, ranging in age from 5-11 years old. I also sing at church and do a little photography on the side.

lender.name: New Tech Philanthropists
lender.loan_because: others are in more need than we are. The blessing of giving comes back to us.
lender.occupational_info: In our school "family", we learn to collaborate and work together. We are outgoing, helpful, caring, and determined. We try to fix any problem and to help others.

lender.name: Ze Mota
lender.loan_because: Helping someone help themselves

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: We all need a bit of help at some point in our life. I know I have in the past, and I want to pay it forward. The more we share, the more we have.
lender.occupational_info: My work is a labor of love. It comes from my heart.

lender.name: Ben Thompson
lender.loan_because: I only have all that I have by chance that I was born in America. I don't deserve it any more than anyone else. And I believe that micro-loans are the best way to put my wealth to good use.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Mathematics in college, but I am not sure what I will do with it. I am passionate about the environment and preventing climate change.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a terrorism fusion center with many different agencies working together.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: My dream is to empower women living in third world countries through business development. Short of leaving my job and my home and spending time in these countries, Kiva is the next best alternative.
lender.occupational_info: I am Director of Communications and Membership for a medical academy of 6,500 physicians and healthcare professionals worldwide

lender.name: Sus Mila
lender.loan_because: every little bit of help makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I hand make jewelry, sculptures and beads with great love and care. I'm also a homemaker who loves cooking and baking Vegan delicacies.

lender.name: Cait
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment, especially the empowerment of women. Women have the power, with a little help, to provide for their families and lift them out of poverty.

lender.name: Marybeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and I believe in giving women in depressed economies the resources to better their lives since there are so many factors stacked against them. I hope every one of them succeeds and improves the lives of their children.

lender.name: Brota
lender.loan_because: We can do better
lender.occupational_info: I make things in a virtual world. Programming code and graphics.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I believe in scattering seeds. Helping out when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary teacher and enjoy working with children.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I would be incredibly selfish if I did not.
lender.occupational_info: I digitally preserve historic documents.

lender.name: Paul and Noreen
lender.loan_because: It is great to help hard working folks improve their lives and that of their children.
lender.occupational_info: We are both retired now, but we had long careers in public service and believe stongly in giving others a helping hand.

lender.name: Lindy
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful idea to help people to realise their dreams and find independence by working to achieve their goals.

lender.name: dick
lender.loan_because: Actions speaks louder than words (kéb mo).
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people (18- 22 yers of age) to become good educated young commercial economists.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to show love.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time student and part time worker at my college

lender.name: Henna
lender.loan_because: “No one can do everything, but everyone can do something, and if we all do one thing, we can change the world.”

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I am trying to open up my own Internet Cafe business here in the Philipiines so I can have a better life for me and my unborn child (Exp. 9/09). I need to buy some used computers and rent a small place along the main road near the school.
lender.occupational_info: I would operate from 8am until 10 pm at night. My customers will be mainly school age students who need to use computers for their studies.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I like to try and make a difference in any small way I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student studying Bachelor of Education to become an upper primary school teacher. I also work in child care with 2 year olds. I love my work!

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: these sums of money could help borrowers improve their lives

lender.name: mBear
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people provide for themselves and their dependents

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: It's fun and it's helpful!
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Pius X Club World Aid
lender.loan_because: we care.
lender.occupational_info: As a club, we look for areas in the world that need help and make others aware of that need and find ways to help.

lender.name: Rockfinance
lender.loan_because: We lend on behalf of the very generous people at Rockefeller College, SUNY Albany - who donate the money for these loans. Our students inspired us by suggesting this project. They are determined to find more sustainable ways to help people around the world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: for the want of a few dollars people's businesses and lives can be improved.
lender.occupational_info: Enjoying the world dream...and I write and speak about nonduality, awakening, and enlightenment.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a female entrepeneur

lender.name: Blues
lender.loan_because: As our mission statement says, "We are dedicated to value and respect the dignity of each individual in our world." Kiva gives us the ability to share the gifts we have been given.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in grades Kindergarten to 8th grade.

lender.name: Gilles
lender.loan_because: it's helpfull !
lender.occupational_info: I'm an attorney at law who defends fundamental human rights in France

lender.name: Jimmer
lender.loan_because: give a person a fish, and they eat for a day. Teach a person to fish, and they eat for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: Sales and marketing of information technology

lender.name: Harry
lender.occupation: Radio TalkShow Host of Car Concerns

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I have more than I could ever ask for, and all they ask for is support.

lender.name: Brett
lender.occupational_info: I am a technology leader and run the business news community nobosh.com.

lender.name: Kimberley
lender.loan_because: I know micocredit programs work and can change lives!

lender.name: Doris
lender.occupation: a university student soon to be graduate

lender.name: Shreya
lender.loan_because: Oh, I get by with a little help from my friends Mm, I get high with a little help from my friends Mm, I'm gonna try with a little help from my friends

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to support other entrepreneurs.

lender.name: ROGER PHOLO
lender.loan_because: because of my work .i am a farmer and have cocoa but now i am not able to do the work for my self i need a loan so i can be helped by others and create new employments too
lender.occupational_info: my wok is very hard ,i am now planting cocoa and have more than then hectares so i can not do this myself.i need loan and i am able to reimburse easily.

lender.name: Meagan
lender.loan_because: I want to help as much as I can from where I am.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: there are so many people in this world who need just a little bit of help. Hopefully, I can help as many individuals as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes toothpaste and soap. I enjoy playing tennis, traveling, and continuing to learn about the world.

lender.name: Ana Maria
lender.occupation: creative director in advertising,fine arts artist

lender.name: Nizar
lender.loan_because: I want to make a help talented individual savy entrepreneur raise their financial standards
lender.occupational_info: Self Employed - Retail Industry

lender.name: GodTalk
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of twenty and thirty-somethings who gather each week to connect to each other and to God. Lending through Kiva is just one way we want to show God's great love for all people.

lender.name: Carlotta
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves. I would be no one without the help of others and I understand how truly blessed I am to live in the USA and have all the things I do (running water, warmth, security, clothes, food). I have love for these other people and want to help them as we are all brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of people when they get married and have celebrations. I also am raising my 2 small children.

lender.name: Sr Eric Metzler
lender.loan_because: By luck of the draw I was born in the U.S. I can think of no better way to use our wealth than to help others who don't have access to captial.
lender.occupational_info: I advise and assist university professors in their teaching duties.

lender.name: yomtov
lender.loan_because: i wish to halp for the injuerd soul in my cantry
lender.occupational_info: i am artisit i donot have work iam spaend my time on drowinig paynt iam yusing simpel coler pancil ido not have soplay &many i injuerd soul by tray be normal life.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I LEND because I am an Economist and believe that Microfinance is the best way for a person to improve their own life. I firmly believe that capitalism works and it is an amazing opportunity to share this gift with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student but also an Economist/Financier who works with investments and businesses. I also serve in the military.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting the good and diligent work of my fellow man.

lender.name: Ben & Jayme
lender.loan_because: there's more than enough to share with people who are working to improve the lives of themselves & others around them. Keep making your dreams happen!!

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I think that this a great cause and I love being able to help people across the world. More people should be involved in this amazing program.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at St. Norbert College in Wisconsin, United States of America. I am studying Vocal Performance and Spanish.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place in any small way I can. I'm not rich, but Kiva allows me to affect a positive change in someone I've never met.
lender.occupational_info: I am a special education teacher for junior high students with mental retardation.

lender.name: Corey F
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the people who are trying to make their community and family better off.
lender.occupational_info: I look at the physical condition of buildings for people who are thinking of purchasing a property. I work primarily in California.

lender.name: Alan-Michael
lender.occupational_info: I work for Panera Bread Company, a bakery cafe that provides a great atmosphere alongside soups, salads and sandwhiches. I'm also a student studying languages, cultures and communication

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Systemic poverty affects us all.
lender.occupational_info: I attempt to help young people make sense of the current state of the World by understanding various perspectives and motivations in the subjects under the "social studies" umbrella (History, Geography, Political Science, Economics, Psychology, and Sociology).

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: I want to help people realize their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of public health

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: it's nice to be able to give people a chance to help themselves
